page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS/SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
Social concerns include {MEALS ON {WHEELS}which are provided for the elderly, infirm and housebound residents of the parish. A {HOME HELP {SERVICE}is in existence. A local District Nurse calls on bedridden patients and nascent mothers. The Rector of Diptford calls regularly on the sick, providing a valuable link with medical services.
Supernatural. There is a local story regarding a {SUPERNATURAL BEING}at Witchcombe, but no contemporary sighting has been reported. However, the name "Witchcombe" tends to suggest a strong possibility of unusual goings-on at some time in the past.
